type.en: Course with defence at the end

description.en:
Composition and defense of doctoral thesis.
Doctoral thesis in mathematical statistics is an integral study in probability theory, mathematical statistics or related fields. Doctoral thesis can be one of the following types:
1) a theoretical study containing analytical results,
2) a methodological study focused on some specific method, proposing new approaches and demonstrating their efficiency,
3) an applied research study where modern innovative stochastic methods are applied to solve a significant large scale problem in another field.

objectives.en: The purpose of doctoral thesis is to raise, via solving an actual problem on specialty,  the level of knowledge and skills of PhD students' to the standard expected from specialty professionals in the international scientific community.
objectives.et: Doktoritöö eesmärk on aktuaalse erialase probleemi lahendamise kaudu  viia doktorandi teadmised ja  oskused rahvusvahelises teadusruumis tunnustatud kõrgprofessionaalsele tasemele. Doktorikraadiga spetsialist on iseseisev uurija, kes on võimeline analüüsima tema ette püstitatud erialaseid  probleeme ja neile lahendusi leidma kas üksinda või ühistöös töögrupiga.

learning_outcomes.en: After defending the doctoral thesis the student
1) has in-depth knowledge in some specific area of probability theory, mathematical statistics and data analysis;
learning_outcomes.et: - on omandanud süvateadmised ja oskused mingis tõenäosusteooria, matemaatilise statistika või andmeanalüüsi kitsamas valdkonnas;

learning_outcomes.en: 2) is able to create research problems and plan and carry out research work;

3) is able to present their positions in an argumentative manner and present the results of their research in professional national and international research communication (publications, conferences, seminars, etc.)
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab uurimistulemusi esitada argumenteeritud viisil nii kohalikul kui rahvusvahelisel tasandil (artiklid, konverentsid jne)

learning_outcomes.en: 4) is able to see the application possibilities of the results of their research.
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab püstitada teaduslikke probleeme oma erialal ja neid lahendada.
